EmailTemplate.description: BSK Import/Export release – Trans-ship (Import or Export)
EmailTemplate.name: BSK Import/Export release – Trans-ship (Import or Export)
EmailTemplate.subject: Trans-ship unit blocked for: <Reason> Sales Order: <SO#>; Customer: <SAPCUST#>; {!Case.AccountName}: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please release the following Sales Order
Outbound delivery number: <Delivery Nr.>
Sales Order: <SO#> Customer Name: {!Case.AccountName} P/N: <p/n> Tranship destination: <Destination> Block type: <block type> A/C tail number: <tail#>
Best Regards, {!Case.OwnerFirstNameLastName}
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
